import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form' import axios from 'axios' export default function Brand_Page() { const [privewImage, setPrivewImage] = useState("https://1000logos.net/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/Nike-Logo-tumb.jpg") const [imageUpload, setImageUpload] = useState() const { inp, handleSubmit, formState: { error } } = useForm() const handlePost = async (data) => { const image = new FormData() image.append("file", imageUpload) image.append("cloud_name", "dswqplrdx") image.append("upload_preset", "qh49wlsn") const response = await axios.post("https://api.cloudinary.com/v1_1/dswqplrdx/image/upload", image) const result = { url_logo: response.data.url, name: data.name } console.log(result); } const onChangeImage = (e) => { setImageUpload(e.target.files[0]) setPrivewImage(URL.createObjectURL(e.target.files[0])) } return (
